channel.title: [P.I] Npc drop exception
channel.description:
Basically when killing some Npc's as the drop loads it throws the following exception and the server completely crashes, never had this problem before. I'm using JSON drop system.
Any help is appreciated;
[CODE]SEVERE: Exception during task execution. java.lang.NullPointerException at main.model.npcs.NPCHandler.dropItems(NPCHandler.java:4384) at main.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:3665) at main.Server$1.execute(Server.java:210) at main.event.Task.tick(Task.java:118) at main.event.TaskScheduler.run(TaskScheduler.java:103) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.access$301(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[2/3/16 3:42 PM]: returncode:5 [/CODE]

item.title: [P.I] Npc drop exception
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

Is your problem fixed if not i can help you out?

Read full topic

item.title: [P.I] Npc drop exception
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You need to make sure the drop is not null before trying to use it.
Essentially:

if(drop != null) { //drop item for player }

Read full topic
